Classes
pose_estimation.h File Reference

Pose estimation node of the drone (x,y,z,theta,phi,psi) in an absolute coordinate frame. At the present: on the basis of the Odometry computed in ardrone_autonomy. In future developpment: Kalman filters, visual odometry, raw sensors, etc. More...

#include <ardrone_autonomy/Navdata.h>
#include <ros/ros.h>
#include <signal.h>
#include <nav_msgs/Odometry.h>
#include <ucl_drone/Pose3D.h>

Classes

class  PoseEstimator
 

Detailed Description

Pose estimation node of the drone (x,y,z,theta,phi,psi) in an absolute coordinate frame. At the present: on the basis of the Odometry computed in ardrone_autonomy. In future developpment: Kalman filters, visual odometry, raw sensors, etc.

Author
Arnaud Jacques & Alexandre Leclere
Date
2016

Part of ucl_drone. Pose estimation ROS node for the ardrone. Contains:

  • pose Publisher
  • sensor fusion
    Todo:
    {Kalman Filter}
